item.title: Vertex Blend Triplanar Shader In Unity
item.description: This shader uses triplanar mapping, blending multiple textures using the mesh’s vertex colors.

item.title: Anisotropic Highlight Hair Shader In Unity
item.description: Unity URP Aniso Highlight Hair Shader This shader was put together to enhance the rendering of hair models in Unity URP using Shader Graph.

item.title: 80s Hairstyle In Unity
item.description: 80s Hairstyle In Unity URP I crafted a 80s hairstyle using Blender, adopting a common hair creation workflow often associated with ZBrush.

item.title: Privacy
